TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_angangan, title = angangan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/angangan} }

S.FORM: u zuma a kamu u kamu nu Hulam: tinaku a kamu yadah ku angangan nu da'dac i umah. . hinalangaw ku sakul a palumaen. . tabaki tu ku angangan niya sakul i Maibul. . sulac nayi' ku mamaala. . angangan nu sulac sasangen tu mahud, manamuh ku ayam mukan tu heci. . u angangan nu hanhan ita ku bala'. . letek han niza ku angangan nu apalu. . mapudac nu ungay ku angangan nu paza'. . mulangaw ku tatangila i angangan nu kilang. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
